title: Command a Squad
description: You're responsible for twenty men today. Lead them well.

success.text: Your men follow your commands without hesitation. The captain commends your leadership before the company.

failure.text: Your orders were confused. The men hesitated at the wrong moment. Mistakes were made.

critical_failure.text: The squad routed under your command. Men died because they followed you. The lord's disappointment is crushing.

decline.text: You refuse command when it's offered. The captain's face shows he expected better.

title: Strategic Planning
description: The lord wants your assessment of the enemy position. Speak your mind with wisdom.

success.text: Your strategy wins the day. The lord calls you his right hand before the assembled host.

failure.text: Your advice leads to setbacks. Men struggle because the lord trusted your judgment.

decline.text: The lord asked for your counsel. Your silence is seen as cowardice or incompetence.

title: Coordinate Supply
description: Organize the baggage train. Keep us fed and equipped on the march.

success.text: Every man gets his ration. No fights, no complaints. The march continues smoothly.

failure.text: Supplies went missing. Some men ate well while others starved. You lost control.

critical_failure.text: Half the stores disappeared. Theft or incompetence? Either way, the lord is asking questions about you.

decline.text: The baggage train is vital. Your refusal to manage it shows poor judgment.

title: Interrogate Prisoner
description: We captured an enemy scout. Find out what he knows about their plans.

success.text: He talks. You learn their troop numbers and march route. The lord himself hears your report.

failure.text: He tells you nothing but lies. The captain wastes men on false information.

decline.text: 'No stomach for hard questions?' The captain's respect for you dies a little.

title: Inspect Company Readiness
description: Walk the camp. Tell the lord if we're ready for battle.

success.text: Your thorough inspection finds problems before they become disasters. The lord trusts your assessment completely.

failure.text: You missed critical issues. The lord discovers them himself. Your judgment is questioned.

decline.text: The lord trusted you with this duty. Your refusal is incomprehensible. He won't ask again.
